title: Trees for the wheatlands
creator_credit: Western Australian Government Film Unit and Norman A. Uren
brief_description: The importance of trees for shade and shelter, beautification, and control of wind erosion in certain areas of the wheatbelt. The Forests Department of Western Australia renders valuable service to farmers and others who desire to plant trees on their properties.
creator_credit_for_label: Western Australian Government Film Unit and Norman A. Uren
